mapper.insert: insert into cash_table (c_number, s_cash, s_info, s_memo, s_pName, s_tAsset, s_pAsset, s_mAsset) values (#{c_number}, #{s_cash}, #{s_info}, #{s_memo}, #{s_pName}, #{s_tAsset}, #{s_pAsset}, #{s_mAsset})
mapper.update: update cash_tabel from s_cash = #{s_cash}, s_info = #{s_info}, s_memo = #{s_memo}, s_pName = #{s_pName}, s_tAsset = #{s_tAsset} where s_number = #{s_number}
